title: Mrs Graca Machel - Girls Not Brides

quotes: The framework, adopted in September 2015, includes target 5.3 to ‘end child, early and forced marriage’ by 2030.
The framework, adopted in September 2015, includes target 5.3 to ‘end child, early and forced marriage’ by 2030.

organizations.name: The Elders
quotes: Machel is a founding member of The Elders, and a co-founder of Girls Not Brides: The Global Partnership to End Child Marriage.

organizations.name: Girls Not Brides: The Global Partnership to End Child Marriage
quotes: Machel is a founding member of The Elders, and a co-founder of Girls Not Brides: The Global Partnership to End Child Marriage.

organizations.name: High-Level Panel on the Post-2015 Development Agenda
quotes: As a member of the High-Level Panel on the Post-2015 Development Agenda, Mrs Machel advocated for the inclusion of child marriage as a target in the sustainable development agenda.

organizations.name: Partnership for Maternal, Newborn & Child Health
quotes: Machel is the Board Chair of the Partnership for Maternal, Newborn & Child Health, and Board Chair of the African Centre for the Constructive Resolution of Disputes, and President of the Foundation for Community Development.

organizations.name: African Centre for the Constructive Resolution of Disputes
quotes: Machel is the Board Chair of the Partnership for Maternal, Newborn & Child Health, and Board Chair of the African Centre for the Constructive Resolution of Disputes, and President of the Foundation for Community Development.

organizations.name: Foundation for Community Development
quotes: Machel is the Board Chair of the Partnership for Maternal, Newborn & Child Health, and Board Chair of the African Centre for the Constructive Resolution of Disputes, and President of the Foundation for Community Development.

organizations.name: Graça Machel Trust
quotes: As founder of the Graça Machel Trust, she has more recently focused on advocating for women’s economic and financial empowerment, education for all, an end to child marriage, food security and nutrition, and democracy and good governance.

roles.title: Education Minister
quotes: Machel fought for the country’s independence before becoming Mozambique’s first Education Minister.

Born in Mozambique, Machel fought for the country’s independence before becoming Mozambique’s first Education Minister.
